QuestData.Title: Rezan, Loa of Kings
QuestData.Description:
Rezan be a powerful loa, one of great importance ta da Zandalari.
We need ta rescue him... but dis creature be projectin' a barrier of death. Notin' be gettin' in.
Unless... I be usin' me own anima ta shield ya from its magic.
Ya gotta act fast and kill da monster dat be drainin' Rezan. Me anima not gonna last forever.
Say da word when ya ready ta go.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This fiend is draining Rezan, loa of kings, of his last anima. It must be stopped!
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept some of Vol'jin's anima to protect yourself, then slay Exhaurbius to save Rezan.
QuestData.RewardText:
Me be feelin' Rezan's essence inside of me... he be trustin' me wit' a great gift.
No matter what be comin' next, me not gonna let him down.
